title: Did Trump say, " We must get back four years '?
subtitle: The comment during the Wisconsin campaign rally was widely interpreted to mean that the President might seek a third mandate.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, said during the 2020 re-election campaign, "We must get a four-year re-election" - that is, the restoration of his first term after re-election - effectively gave him a third term.
